rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 6 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 8:29 PM, 16 June 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bataan, Pampanga and Bulacan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Quezon(General Nakar) and Zambales(Palauig, Masinloc) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
